alert.note: Alert for Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 21 at 4:39PM MST until December 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... Snow has ended across the area, so the Winter Weather Advisory will be allowed to expire. Dangerous wind chills are still expected through Thursday morning. * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Yellowstone National Park. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
